briefTitle: A Multinational, Open-Label, Non-Controlled Trial on Safety, Efficacy and Pharmacokinetics of NNC 0129-0000-1003 in Previously Treated Paediatric Patients With Severe Haemophilia A
officialTitle: A Multinational, Open-Label, Non-Controlled Trial on Safety, Efficacy and Pharmacokinetics of NNC 0129-0000-1003 in Previously Treated Paediatric Patients With Severe Haemophilia A
summary: This trial is conducted globally. The aim of the trial is to investigate safety, efficacy and pharmacokinetics (the exposure of the trial drug in the body) of NNC 0129-0000-1003 (N8-GP) in children with severe haemophilia A who have undergone treatment with previous factor VIII (FVIII) products.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Inhibitory Antibodies Against Coagulation Factor VIII (FVIII) ≥0.6 Bethesda Units
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: During the main phase of the trial (from 0-26 weeks of treatment)
